Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeathKnight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract structure for player objects. Player class defines all the necessary functions and values which are used by non-abstract classes extending Player. Each Player is defined by unique name. Player is able to attack, be attacked, store up to 12 items in inventory, equip up to 6 Equip items to raise own stats, earn experience (XP), gold, use items (if they can be used), sell items or reach new levels. The higher level player has, the stronger player is. Player is shown in map in JavaFX Circle object.

      public double attack​(double attackPower, int energyCost)
      If the player is alive, deals damage with his/her attack and may lose some energy.
      Returns:
      Integer value representing the attack power.

    • dealMeDmg

      public void dealMeDmg​(double dmg)
      Given damage is decreased according to player resistance and then dealt to player. If the damage is greater than current player HP. HP is set to 0.
      Parameters:
      dmg - Damage value, that will be decreased by certain amount and then dealt to player.

    • addHp

      public void addHp​(int hp)

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      player - Player which is connected to the certain circle.
